title: Wake Up Ladies: The Series
overview: Nat is a Neurologist who does not only treat the physical diseases of his patients, but also their personal problems. He also uses various women from different backgrounds and with different personalities for his case study who have only one thing in common. Each of them is in dire need of some romance. While these women reveal their own secrets in regards to their past husband, they also make a bet as to who'll marry first of them.
